name: k6-zap-perfsec-automation
description: Performance and security testing using k6 and OWASP ZAP

scripts.zap:baseline: docker run -v $(pwd):/zap/wrk/:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-baseline.py -t https://example.com -r zap-report.html
scripts.zap:full-scan: docker run -v $(pwd):/zap/wrk/:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-full-scan.py -t https://example.com -r zap-report.html
